moves.1. e4: Hey this is a game that i played for the 61st Gk Tournament, round 5. It was a strong match with a tough opponent. Comments about the game are really welcomed! So i played with black ( i like white more but what can i do?). The game started with e4.
moves.1... e5: I played e5. I don't often play the sicilian cause e5 suits me better.
moves.2. d4: And then d4. Nice though most prefer to play Nf3.
moves.2... exd4: I accepted the challenge and took the pawn.
moves.3... Nc6: Open the knight and push the queen back.
moves.4. Qd5: Instead he played Qd5. I think Qd1 is better.
moves.4... Nf6: I open the other one knight. I wanted to develop all my pieces and hold a strong position.
moves.5. Qc4: Again not the greatest position for his queen i think.
moves.5... Be7: I wanted to castled and though the position is quite pathetic i think is the best.
moves.6... O-O: I castled and try now to develop the rest of my pieces.
moves.7. c3: c3? Playing Nc3 or Bd3 is better i think.
moves.7... d5: And now d5. Good move as i open the diagon for my bishop and also push the queen and the centre.
moves.8... Nxd5: And i took it back with my knight.
moves.9. g3: g3? For me it's a bad move but ok if he's gonna play then Bg2.
moves.9... Re8: Still his king is exposed and i wanted to check and attack( generally).
moves.10. Nbd2: He should have played Be2 i guess.
moves.11. Ne4: He played Ne4. Maybe it was the greatest reply.
moves.12. Bg2: Bg2? I think he's ignoring the threat coming from my rook.
moves.12... f5: f5! I think that was strong!
moves.13... fxe4: I took the knight and i should say i have a good position.
moves.14. O-O: He castled after many moves he spent.
moves.14... Na5: I push the queen. Nothing serious.
moves.15... Nf6: Now i want to protect the pawn so Nf6 would be a good move.
moves.16. Be3: Exchanging bishops? I didn't care actually.
moves.18. Qa4 Be2: I played Be2 for both rook and then queen.
moves.19... Bb5: Threaten his queen. I think he did not have a clear plan on his mind. And he's a piece down.
moves.20. Qc2 Nc4: Open the knight. I wanted to be in square d6.
moves.22. Rad1: He's trying to attack to my queen. Good move.
moves.23. b3 Nd6: I put it back where i wanted.
moves.25... Ng4: Maybe i should have played another move.
moves.26. a3: Now he wants the piece back.
moves.26... Nf7: So i played Nf7 proteck both knight and bishop later.
moves.28. Qc3: Now he wants to push the g7 square.
moves.28... Qe6: I played with my queen to prevent his knight move to f5.
moves.29. c5: Typical to put my bishop back.
moves.29... Ba7: Logical move. Now it's awkard there.
moves.30. Bh3: He wants to push my knight. Good move.
moves.31. Bc1: Bad move i guess. f3 would be better for him.
moves.31... gxh4: I took the other knight too.
moves.32... Qg6: There my queen is in a strong position.
moves.33. Bb2: Obviously that move is good but now i think it's too late.
moves.35... e3+: And anothe check in which he resigned. I hope you like my game!
